thread.title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Robbie Roscoe gets a scare in the shower tonight
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks spoilers: Robbie Roscoe gets a scare in the shower tonight

title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Robbie Roscoe gets a scare in the shower tonight
text:
Monday, Oct 12 2015, 13:42 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Hollyoaks bad boy Robbie Roscoe gets surprised in the shower tonight (October 12) by the last person he was hoping to see.Trevor Royle (Greg Wood) decides to give the teen a scare after growing suspicious over his strange behaviour.The drama plays out after Robbie ( Charlie Wernham ) continues to spy on Trevor, desperate to find anything that would be useful to the police.When Robbie follows Trevor to an unfamiliar address, he's shocked when the gangster's ex-partner Grace Black appears at the window and starts angrily throwing things at him.Trevor isn't too pleased to see Robbie giggling away from afar and wonders why he's being spied on, so later sneaks up on him in the shower. Caught off guard, how will Robbie explain himself?

Will Robbie's story be believed? Hollyoaks ' latest episode also sees Ste Hay's fling with Harry Thompson continue as they seize the chance for more alone time.When Ste (Kieron Richardson) brings Harry's dad Tony some bad news about his Hollyoaks Pride plans, the businessman rushes out to deal with the problem.Harry (Parry Glasspool) has homework to do but Ste can't resist enticing him away. Is it only a matter of time before their steamy affair is exposed?
